net.maritimecloud.util.geometry

Class PositionReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.maritimecloud.util.geometry.PositionReader

  • public abstract class PositionReader
extends Object
    A interface describing a way to get the current position (and timestamp of the reading) for an object.

    Any implementations are not required to be thread safe.

    See Also:
    PositionReaderSimulator

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PositionReader()

      Returns a reader that returns the same position every time.
      static PositionReader fixedPosition(PositionTime positionTime)
      Returns a reader that returns the same position and time every time.
      abstract PositionTime getCurrentPosition()
      Returns the current position and a timestamp for when the position was read.
      static PositionReader nativeReader()
      Returns a position reader that will return the current position on a native devices.

      • PositionReader

        public PositionReader()

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentPosition

        public abstract PositionTime getCurrentPosition()
        Returns the current position and a timestamp for when the position was read. The timestamp, measured in milliseconds, must be the difference between the current time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC.
        Returns:
        the current position and time

      • fixedPosition

        public static PositionReader fixedPosition(Position position)
        Returns a reader that returns the same position every time.
        Parameters:
        position - the position to return every time
        Returns:
        a new fixed position reader

      • fixedPosition

        public static PositionReader fixedPosition(PositionTime positionTime)
        Returns a reader that returns the same position and time every time.
        Parameters:
        positionTime - the position time to return every time
        Returns:
        a new fixed position reader

      • nativeReader

        public static PositionReader nativeReader()
        Returns a position reader that will return the current position on a native devices.
        Returns:
        a position reader that will return the current position on a native devices
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if a native position reader is not available
